name: Figure Skating 3D - Ice Dance
description:
Figure Skating 3D - Ice Dance is a beautiful ice skating simulator for girls.
NICE CHARACTER
PEFORMANCE PROGRAM
DIFFERENT GRADE TRICKS
AND SEVERE JUDGING are waiting for you!

• Cute girl is doing professional ice skating tricks.
• Try to complete a set of tasks given on a level.
• Get the highest score and make the smoothest final.
• Calculate a speed of your fingers and set the level of difficulty.
• The higher a level, the harder the tricks.
• Push certain buttons to make a pirouette.

All your movements are followed by special jury that gives you fair marks. Don't miss a step!

Figure Skating 3D - Ice Dance is a game for true fans of sport on ice. Choose levels by your own opportunities and show the jury, who will represent a new era of ice skating on the next championship!
